BIG BAD BRUCE

Storyline:

Big Bad Bruce isn't just any regular old NFT - it's a reflection of your attitude in life, and how you go about living. It's about waking up in the morning and grabbing life by the cojones! Bruce don't take no crap and neither should you. With 10,000 unique NFT collectables available, you can be be sure to find a Bruce that suits your flavour. We have teamed up with two speacial non-for-profit animal rescue shelters by donating a portion of all proceeds to their charities. So not only will you be a badass like Bruce by owning one of his NFTs, but your purchases will directly contribute to establishing a loving home for lone dogs out on the streets.

How It Works:

  1. Install the Metamask extension on your browser and create a wallet if you don't already have one.
  2. Fund your Metamask wallet with Ethereum (ETH).
  3. Go to the OpenSea website and search for the "Big Bad Bruce" collection.
  4. Select the NFT that you want to purchase.
  5. Click the "Buy Now" button and enter the amount of ETH you want to pay.
  6. Confirm the transaction on Metamask by reviewing the gas fees and clicking "Confirm."
  7. Wait for the transaction to be confirmed on the Ethereum blockchain (this may take a few minutes).
  8. Once the transaction is confirmed, the NFT will be transferred to your Metamask wallet and you will be the new owner of the "Big Bad Bruce" NFT.
